metadata.title: CVE-2024-35869 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  smb: client: guarantee refcounted children from parent session  Avoid potential use-after-free bugs when walking DFS referrals, mounting and performing DFS failover by ensuring that all children from parent @tcon->ses are also refcounted.  They're all needed across the entire DFS mount.  Get rid of @tcon->dfs_ses_list while we're at it, too.
